languages.text: "Одно старое недоразумение. Ему уже сто лет. Не стоит вашего внимания, Лорд-капитан".
"An old misunderstanding. Over a century old by now. It isn't worth your time, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "Одно старое недоразумение. Ему уже сто лет. Не стоит вашего внимания, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: "An old misunderstanding. Over a century old by now. It isn't worth your attention, Lord Captain."
"An old misunderstanding. Over a century old by now. It isn't worth your attention, Lord Captain."
"An old misunderstanding. Over a century old by now. It isn't worth your time, Lord Captain."
"An old misunderstanding. Over a century old by now. It isn't worth your time, Lord Captain."
"An old misunderstanding. Over a century old by now. It isn't worth your time, Lord Captain."
"An old misunderstanding. Over a century old by now. It isn't worth your time, Lord Captain."

languages.text: "Ein altes Missverständnis. Über ein Jahrhundert alt, inzwischen. Es ist Eure Zeit nicht wert, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "An old misunderstanding. Over a century old by now. It isn't worth your time, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Ein altes Missverständnis. Über ein Jahrhundert alt, inzwischen. Es ist Eure Zeit nicht wert, Lord Captain."

languages.text: « Juste un vieux malentendu qui remonte à plus d'un siècle. Ça ne mérite pas que vous perdiez votre temps avec ça, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: "An old misunderstanding. Over a century old by now. It isn't worth your time, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: « Juste un vieux malentendu qui remonte à plus d'un siècle. Ça ne mérite pas que vous perdiez votre temps avec ça, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »

languages.text: “只是很久以前的误会罢了。已经是一百多年前的事情了，不值得您浪费时间，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: "An old misunderstanding. Over a century old by now. It isn't worth your time, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: “只是很久以前的误会罢了。已经是一百多年前的事情了，不值得您浪费时间，舰长大人。”

languages.text: 「昔のすれ違いだ。もう100年以上も前のこと。あなたの時間を使う価値はない、ロード・キャプテン」
languages.original_text: "An old misunderstanding. Over a century old by now. It isn't worth your time, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: 「昔のすれ違いだ。もう100年以上も前のこと。あなたの時間を使う価値はない、ロード・キャプテン」

languages.text: «Un antiguo malentendido. Ya tiene más de un siglo. No merece su tiempo, Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: "An old misunderstanding. Over a century old by now. It isn't worth your time, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: «Un antiguo malentendido. Ya tiene más de un siglo. No merece su tiempo, Lord Capitán».

languages.text: "Eski bir yanlış anlaşılma. Üstünden çok sular geçti. Vaktinizi harcamanıza değmez Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: "An old misunderstanding. Over a century old by now. It isn't worth your time, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Eski bir yanlış anlaşılma. Üstünden çok sular geçti. Vaktinizi harcamanıza değmez Lord Kaptan."
